context: Good! Looking for a movie recommendation for this weekend. I like dark comedies, like Fargo (1996).
Yes. I love my dead gay son! great movie
Another great dark comedy is The War of the Roses (1989).
I've heard of that, but not seen it. I'll have to check it out.
resp: You might also like The Stepford Wives (2004), the 2004 version. The older ones aren't as funny.
